activities.title: Rainbow Garden Adventure
activities.description: Learn about color theory through a hands-on gardening activity!

activities.title: Colorful Canvas Creations
activities.description: Be introduced to color theory through an engaging painting activity!

activities.title: Color Treasure Hunt
activities.description: Learn about colors and enhance their understanding of color theory through a fun and interactive treasure hunt activity at home!

activities.title: Bubble Burst of Colors
activities.description: Learn about color theory through a creative and enjoyable activity involving blowing bubbles of different colors!

activities.title: Color Wheel Quest
activities.description: Learn to understand different hues and their placement on a color wheel, through a hands-on and interactive activity!

activities.title: Nature's Rainbow Scavenger Hunt
activities.description: Learn about color theory through an interactive and sensory nature walk activity, collecting items of various colors from the outdoors.

activities.title: Colorful Chef Adventure
activities.description: Learn about the importance of a balanced diet and the variety of nutrients in different-colored foods through a fun cooking activity!

activities.title: Fashion Color Splash
activities.description: Learn about color theory through a creative and hands-on activity of customizing clothes with fabric paints!

activities.title: Plant different colored vegetables in the garden!
activities.description: Kids can learn about the different colors of different vegetables through this activity!

activities.title: See what happens when you mix colors!
activities.description: Kids can see what happens when you mix paint colors together - without the mess of doing it at home!

activities.title: Test your knowledge! What color do mixed colors make?
activities.description: Kids can see if they know which colors mixed colors make!

activities.title: Match the objects to their correct color!
activities.description: Kids can look at the colors of different objects and sort them by color!

activities.title: Pop the bubbles with the right color!
activities.description: Kids can learn how to identify different colors with this bubble popping game.

activities.title: Match the color to the color wheel!
activities.description: Kids can match the color to different colors on the color wheel!

activities.title: Build a train with different art terms!
activities.description: For more advanced kids, they can build onto a train car and test their knowledge of different art terms!

activities.title: Play a matching game to test your knowledge of art terms!
activities.description: For more advanced kids, they can play a matching game to test their knowledge of art terms!

activities.title: Drag the leaf to the correct box!
activities.description: Kids can test their knowledge of different colors by placing the leaves in the right spot!
